person.persName: Allen Porter Hudson (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and lieutenant)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and lieutenant. Illinois native. Married to Eliza J. Hudson. Father of Avery Hudson, James Hudson. Appointed as lieutenant.
